lines.text: You think I don't appreciate art? You think I don't understand fashion? You think I'm not hip? You think I'm pathetic? A nerd? A lard-ass fat-so? You think I'm shit? Well, you're wrong, 'cause i'm champagne, and you're shit. Until the day you die, you, not me, will always be shit.

[picks up phone]
Hello?

I know who you are and you are nothing. You think you are fucking something, but you are fucking nothing. You are empty. You are a zero. You are a black hole, and I'm gonna fuck you so bad you'll be coming out of your ears.
[slams down phone, pants for air]
I wake up happy, feeling good... but then I get very depressed, because I'm living in reality.
I want kids that love me as much as I hated my mother.
Johnny, was there anyone in the last day or two who..."hurt" you?
No. I... I... I don't think so.
But someone did hurt you... no, Johnny?
No. No-one hurt me.
What do ya mean no? You've been FUCKING RAPED!
[after Bill recalls his dream]
And how is this different?
I don't kill myself at the end.
What do you think would happen if I got him a professional... you know...
A professional?
Hooker. You know, the kind that can teach things... first-timers, you know... break him in.
But Joe, he's 11.
You're right, you're right. It's too late.
I'm not laughing at you, I'm laughing with you.
But I'm not laughing.
I love New Jersey.
Don't you miss Russia?
Fuck the cunt of Russia.
Well, I guess it's best to feel that way.
I'm living in a state of irony.

It's just I'm... I'm so tired of being admired all the time. All these men I mean... they're all beautiful, artistic minds, great sex, the whole package, but hollow, you know what I mean? I feel nobody's really honest with me. Nobody wants me for me.
[last lines]
I came.

[singing]
It seems the things I've wanted in my life I've never had. And so it's no surprise that living only leaves me sad. Happiness, where are you? I've searched so long for you. Happiness, what are you? I haven't got a clue. Happiness, why do you have to stay... so far away... from me?
Anyway, so the police came and looked in her freezer and found baggies filled with the doorman's genitals.
I use baggies.
Me too.
Everyone uses baggies, that's why we can all relate to this crime. Don't you see?
Pussy... need pussy.
Can I smell your panties?

I don't know I could ever really begin to talk to her. I mean what can I talk about? I have nothing to talk about, I'm boring. And that I know, I've been told before so don't tell me it's not true 'cause it's a fact. I bore the people. People look at me and they get bored, people listen to me and they zone out... bored. 'Who is that boring person?', they think. 'I've never before met anyone so boring'. And I'm for her to see how boring I am.
I fucked them.
What was it like?
It was... it was great.
Would you do it again?
Yes.
How come no matter how much you treat me like shit, I can't help loving you even more?
You know I wish you had told me this twenty years ago. Now I'm gonna have to get another FUCKING FACELIFT!
Are you wet? Is your pussy all wet?
I am not a scab... I am a strikebreaker.
If only I had been raped as a child! *Then* I would know authenticity!

[sobbing]
... would you ever fuck me?
No... I'd jerk off instead.
[sobs]
Have you tried playing with yourself?
You mean...?
With your penis?
A little.
How did it feel?
I don't know? I don't know what to do.
Do you want me to, uh... show you?
I want you to fuck me.
I don't think I can do that.
Oh, I sure hope the kids don't catch whatever he's got.
I've had you on auto-redial all night.

[mumbling]
I'm gonna fuck you so hard, you'll be coming out of your ears. Fuck you...
Dickwad?
Yes, only "come" can be used as a verb as well.
What Ronald Farber doesn't know is that it's not length that matters, it's width.
Oh, Bill. Please don't get mad at me. I know you hate it when I ask, but... Do you still?
Oh.
Oh.
Yes. Very very much.
Oh, Bill, and I do too! I'm sorry I need to keep being reminded, it's just...
I know.
And we haven't been.
I know. And it's my fault.
My fault.
Do you have any tuna salad?
Would you like a sandwich?
Yes please.
